attributes.action: Put an end to 0 hours contracts
attributes.additional_details:
Unite Union figures
Jobcentre/agencies for vacancies are often 0 hours.
attributes.background:
0 hour contracts are on the rise,Figures have doubled in the last 5 years alone with estimated 1.8 million jobs on 0 hour contracts according to unite union.
0 Hour contracts offer absolutely no job security,No guaranteed hours or income and companies are starting to exploit this,Needs to stop.
